item.title: Secret BBC filming has exposed a hidden culture of misogyny and racism inside Met Police. After the BBC sent a detailed list of allegations to the Met, it suspended eight officers and one staff member, and took two more officers off front-line duties. #Po

item.title: Four people have been injured in a car ramming and stabbing attack at a synagogue in Manchester, UK. The suspect was shot by police. #Manchester #GreaterManchesterPolice #AndyBurnham #BreakingNews #BBCNews

item.title: Four people have been injured and Greater Manchester Mayor Andy Burnham says the suspect is believed to be dead. The incident comes on Yom Kippur - the holiest day in the Jewish religious calendar. #Manchester #GreaterManchesterPolice #AndyBurnham #Breaki
